text: RStudio is an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for the programming language R. RStudio is made by Posit. RStudio has a free version and a paid version. The paid version is a monthly subscription. RStudio is supported on many Operating Systems (OS) including: * Windows 10 * Windows 11 * MacOS versions 13 and above * Ubuntu 20 * Ubuntu 22 * Ubuntu 24 * Debian 11 * Debian 12 * OpenSUSE 15 * Fedora 34 * Fedora 36 * Red Hat 8 * Red Hat 9 ==References==
title: RStudio
